survey_brief: This survey aims to gather consumer preferences and opinions on sustainable packaging for retail products to inform future packaging design and environmental initiatives.

questions.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging when making a purchase decision?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure importance. Ensure options are balanced and cover the full range of possible responses.

script.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging when making a purchase decision?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable packaging materials do you prefer? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections since preferences may not be mutually exclusive. Include an 'Other' option for unlisted materials.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes, with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable packaging materials do you prefer? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors would encourage you to choose a product with sustainable packaging over conventional packaging?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative insights. Prevents bias from predefined options.

script.question_text: What factors would encourage you to choose a product with sustainable packaging over conventional packaging?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium (e.g., 5-10% more) for products with sustainable packaging?
answer_options: Yes, but only a small premium (up to 5%)
No, I prefer conventional packaging at a lower price
questions.client_notes: Single-choice to gauge price sensitivity. Avoid leading language.
